title: Suburban City Stay with Daily Breakfast, Bottle of Wine and Cocktails on Arrival
description: Enjoy a chic city break in a popular Melbourne suburb at the Novotel Glen Waverley. You’ll find Glen Waverley’s bars, restaurants and the beautiful Dandenong mountain ranges nearby, while it’s just a 30-minute drive into Melbourne CBD. Arrive to a bottle of wine and a welcome cocktail each and wake up to a delicious daily buffet breakfast, with a late 12 noon check-out guaranteed.

title: Contemporary Melbourne Glen Waverley Stay with Indoor Heated Pool & Onsite Restaurant
description:
Positioned in Melbourne's Glen Waverley district, this stylish hotel has everything you need to turn your Melbourne visit into an absolute delight. Take a refreshing dip in the indoor heated pool, get your sweat on at the fitness centre or savour Indian and Middle Eastern fare at the inviting Meze Restaurant.

Just 40 minutes from the CBD, the best of Melbourne is on your doorstep. Stroll to the nearby Glen Waverley dining and shopping hub, jump in the car for a quick 25-minute jaunt to the stunning Dandenong Ranges, and when you're ready to hit the town, world-class galleries, nightlife and performance venues are an easy commute.
offer_address: 285 Springvale Road, Glen Waverley, Victoria 3150, Australia
